dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense the warmth of your living essence, a rare treat amidst the cold spirits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What do you seek from me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I seek not from you but offer a revelation. Will you embrace it or shy away?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am open to your revelations.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice, for knowledge is power in both life and death. Shall we proceed?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Proceed with your revelation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The spirits whisper of a fate entwined with yours. Choose your path wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose not to proceed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a skeptic. A pity, for enlightenment could have been yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer not to dwell in your revelations.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A closed mind is a fragile shield against the unknown. Will you accept the truth or cower?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face the truth bravely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery is commendable, but it can lead to unforeseen consequences. Are you prepared?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not risk knowing your truth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance is a choice, but it can be a dangerous one in the realm of spirits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your revelations do not interest me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A closed heart misses out on the melodies of existence. Will you remain deaf or listen?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will listen to what you have to say.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. The dance of spirits is intricate; it may lead you to unexpected shores.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire to hear your words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness is a trait shared by the lost. May your path be illuminated in the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Why do you speak in riddles?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Riddles cloak truths that bare reality's sharp edges. Will you dare to decipher or retreat in fear?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am intrigued by your riddles.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity begets knowledge, but knowledge begets responsibility. Dare you shoulder it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face the responsibility.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Responsibility embraces those who seek wisdom. May your choices reflect your intentions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not ready for such burdens.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Timidity often shields from pain, but also from growth. Choose wisely, for time cares not for hesitation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Riddles only cloud the truth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Clarity can illuminate, but it can also blind. Do you prefer the comforting darkness or the harsh light of revelation?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek clarity, not darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A seeker of clarity must also face the shadows. Are you willing to embrace both?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am comfortable in my ignorance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance is bliss until reality shatters its facade. Choose your illusions wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for your cryptic words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Time is a river that carries us all, whether we navigate its currents or stand idle. Will you resist or float along?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to navigate the currents.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A bold choice, for the river of time is treacherous. May your voyage be guided by purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer to stand on solid ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stillness offers no progress, only stagnation. The river flows regardless of your choice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your words hold no meaning for me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Meaning is a construct woven by perception. Will you unravel the threads or cling to your illusions?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to explore beyond illusions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Exploration requires courage, for the truth can be a harsh mistress. Are you prepared to face her?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will brave the truth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in the face of truth is a rare gift. May it serve you well on your journey.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to remain in my illusions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Illusions soothe the weary soul, but they also bind it. Will you seek liberation or comfort?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer to hold on to my illusions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Illusions are fragile veils over the abyss of reality. Do you fear the fall or crave the plunge?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no truth, reveal it to me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fearlessness is a rare virtue. Embrace the revelations, for they may reshape your world.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear the darkness beyond illusions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear is a natural response, but it can also be a shackle. Choose your chains wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in your philosophical musings.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interest blooms where curiosity is nurtured. Will you let it wither or let it bloom?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will let curiosity guide me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity is the compass of the adventurous spirit. May it lead you to uncharted territories.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire for uncharted territories.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Familiarity breeds comfort, but also stagnation. Choose your path with awareness.
